content.raw:
I think this is the one I used (from the [Gazebo](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/9410f80cf7a70accd8cde7617b2800872283849f/gazebo/gui/images/rotate.png?at=default) repository, right?) But I resized it to 16x16 to be consistent with the others and it probably lost some resolution... I did it with Inkscape.

Then I darkened all the buttons with GIMP setting the brightness to -100 and contrast to +100...

Should I keep this one large, or make all large, or try to resize it without losing resolution...?
content.html:
I think this is the one I used (from the Gazebo repository, right?) But I resized it to 16x16 to be consistent with the others and it probably lost some resolution... I did it with Inkscape.

Then I darkened all the buttons with GIMP setting the brightness to -100 and contrast to +100...

Should I keep this one large, or make all large, or try to resize it without losing resolution...?
